strings: <voice_0x0100165C><center>Have you collected all of the orbs?

<voice_0x0100165D><center>I too have found what I was looking for
<center>and have not long since returned.

<voice_0x0100165E><center>You cannot hide the truth from me.
<center>It is abundantly clear from
<center>the sparkle in your eyes.

<voice_0x0100165F><center>I wish to impart to you
<center>that which I have found...
<voice_0x01001660><center>But I cannot do so like this.

<voice_0x01001661><center>Please arrange your items so that you
<center>can each carry one more on your person.
<center>The orbs may be kept in your bag.

<voice_0x01001662><center>Then I will impart to you
<center>the world's last hope of survival.

<voice_0x01001663><center>I have located that which may be this world's
<center>last hope. Now, I entrust it to you...
<voice_0x01001664><se_high>Jessica: The sceptre!

<voice_0x01001665><se_low>King Trode: The Sceptre of Trodain! Careful with that!
It's full of hocus-pocus! Don't touch it!

<voice_0x01001666><center>There is no cause for alarm.
<center>The sceptre no longer harbours
<center>Rhapthorne's soul.
<voice_0x01001667><center>Now it holds only the souls of the seven sages.

<voice_0x01001668><center>Over the passage of its long history,
<center>the truth behind this sceptre has been lost.

<voice_0x01001669><center>In the beginning, it was crafted by the hands
<center>of the seven sages under my instruction.
<voice_0x0100166A><center>And they gave it a name.
<voice_0x0100166B><center>They called it, the Godbird Sceptre.

<voice_0x0100166C><center>You will need it if you are to break
<center>the dark shield around Rhapthorne.

<voice_0x0100166D><center>Only when it is broken
<center>will he become vulnerable.
<center>Only then can you fight him.
<voice_0x0100166E><center>I will fly you to his location.

<voice_0x0100166F><center>The Lord of Darkness will
<center>engage you in mortal combat...

<voice_0x01001670><center>But you must endure his attacks as you
<center>pray for the power of the sceptre.

<voice_0x01001671><center>When the four of you pray for its power in
<center>unison, one by one you will summon the souls
<center>of the sages to unlock the power of the orbs.

<voice_0x01001672><center>I can give you no more advice.
<center>Do you understand what you must do
<center>when you face the Lord of Darkness?
<voice_0x01001673><center>Then I will explain it again.

<voice_0x01001674><center>Then we cannot afford to
<center>delay this battle any longer.
<center>Are you ready?
<voice_0x01001675><center>Please, time is short.

<voice_0x01001676><center>You must fight him now.
<center>Take the sceptre.
<Cap><hero> returns to life!
Yangus returns to life!
Jessica returns to life!
Angelo returns to life!
The party's HP and MP are fully restored!
DUMMY MES (e1712 - 450)
Red returns to life!
Morrie returns to life!
